attributes.action: I want to stop this government  from "dimming the sun"
attributes.additional_details:
The nation has not been consulted in this experiment,  surely we have the right to give our consent. Something of this magnitude that has unknown, serious potential  to cause disaster is not for a single government  to decide,  you are tampering with nature.
Therefore permission / consent must be given by the nation after they have been fully informed of what this government is planning.
attributes.background:
I want it put to the entire nation.
Do they consent to have "the sun dimmed" by this government? 
This catastrophic  plan has not been fully disclosed to the nation,  this could have dire consequences for us all , humans, animals and all plant life.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701963
